Name: Wire Lips
About the game: Letaâ€™s life changed in one short moment when fate lead her to a mysterious artifact. Leta went for a walk in the mountains near her hometown with her friend Lina. They were taking photos of nature when they stumbled upon an old music box. Lina decided to take the strange item home: nobody needs it anyway, right? Soon she went missing leaving behind only a photo and the ominous music box. Leta has to uncover the horrifying mysteries of the ancient artifact... - a third-person horror game; - creepy atmosphere; - original style and soundtrack; - lively animated characters; - puzzles; - about two hours of gameplay; - collectibles; - weirdness; - the music box.
